name: holygrail5-template
description: Template moderno basado en Holy Grail Layout con generador de CSS y sistema de componentes

scripts.build: npm run clean && npx holygrail5 --config=./config.json --output=./dist/css/holygrail.css && npm run copy
scripts.copy: cp src/index.html dist/ && cp -r src/js dist/ 2>/dev/null || true && cp -r src/themes dist/css/ 2>/dev/null || true
scripts.dev: npm run build && open http://localhost:3000 && serve dist -l 3000
